replies.body: Our geometry teacher tends to teach himself, so it's the hardest subject I've ever done.
replies.body_tagged: Our geometry teacher tends to teach himself, so it's the hardest subject I've ever done.

replies.body:
First day of school was last Monday. 

Fucking.

Monday.

Before.

Labor Day.

Vice principal is very sick, so apparently everything will be very unorganized this year. Hope she gets better soon :/.

My old science teacher was supposed to teach us this year but she backed out last minute because why the fuck not. She was very good too, and I'm not liking the one I have now.

French teacher is fucking awesome. Half the class comes in as a group to confess to the teacher we haven't read our school reading and she replies saying she hadn't either and then laughed.

Everything else is normal. 

Since were on the depressing subject of school, anyone care to tell me what you guys did this summer? Don't leave anything juicy out, I love stories ;). I'll explain mine to the first person who replies, post is getting too long xD.

replies.body:
I hate calculus and engineering mathematics
Anyone else doing these horrible subjects?
replies.body_tagged:
I hate calculus and engineering mathematics
Anyone else doing these horrible subjects?

replies.body:
I went to Pakistan for 2 months to visit almost my entire family, and got bit by some tiny 15 year old corgi thing. I had to get 4 anti-rabies vaccines.

A science teacher at my school got severely injured, nobody is really sure how. Some say they heard she slipped and hit her head on a bathtub and cracked her skull open. All we know is that it was head trauma or something. She still isn't back, and the staff have said nothing about her. My brother thinks that she maybe hit her head so hard to the point where she can't even walk, let alone remember the science stuff she taught, bringing an end to her career somewhat early. Other people think she might be relearning, or still recovering.

replies.body: i go to popeyes every morning before school because they give free fried chicken 4am-5:30am in Crest Hill. they're so lit.
replies.body_tagged: i go to popeyes every morning before school because they give free fried chicken 4am-5:30am in Crest Hill. they're so lit.

replies.body: Went to Gaspesie (east of Quebec) for a week, it was like a 2000 km road trip. Had fun, but was tired af almost the entire time. Got sick for a night there as well. Ate a lot of poutine xD (French fries, gravy and melted cheese in case you didn't know, only in Quebec).
